articles.author: Elliot Smith
articles.title: Swiss central bank chief rejects 'currency manipulator' label from the U.S. - CNBC
articles.description: The U.S. Treasury added Switzerland to a list of nations it suspects of deliberately devaluing their currencies against the dollar.
articles.content:
LONDON Swiss National Bank President Thomas Jordan has rejected a U.S. decision to label Switzerland a "currency manipulator."
